text: Text S2 Methods, a description of the methods used in vsfold, the time, memory and structural complexity, and the thermodynamics. Provided for readers interested in knowing how the mapping algorithm in vsfold5 works for handling secondary structure and pseudoknots. The calculation of pseudoknot stability and 3 dimensional considerations, the time complexity and the pseudoknot complexity are described or explained here. Found at: doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0000905.s002 (0.68 MB PDF)
